trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_SEQ_00<tab>Donuhanu hums happily as he contemplates unusual fish.

TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_SEQ_01<tab>Donuhanu has asked that you procure Qor pirarucu for Pashenine's rite of passage.
Qor pirarucu can be fished from Karvarhur the First using honeybees as bait.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 433. Delivering items with a rating of 1017 or more will earn greater rewards.

TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver Qor pirarucu to Donuhanu. Pashenine will be ready to undertake his rite of passage once he has finished digesting─so be sure to support him when the time comes.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_TODO_00<tab>Catch Qor pirarucu at Karvarhur the First and deliver them to Donuhanu.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_015<tab>Welcome to Fish Fancies Donu─oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's good to see you.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_016<tab>I've been helping out around the Fancies from time to time. It's the least I can do to repay your and Donuhanu's kindness.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_SYSTEM_000_017<tab>In order to undertake the subsequent quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “The Skyruin.”
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I have good news!

TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_001<tab>That customer who bought our spare Yok Huy pleco has been tellin' all and sundry what a treat they are! Business for the Fancies is─well, not boomin', per se, but much better than usual!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_002<tab>I'm glad my culinary techniques could be of any small help.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_003<tab>Thanks to the two of you, my dream feels within my reach, and my training proceeds apace.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_004<tab>Speaking of─what's next on your fish list? Surely you'll need a few more flippers to guarantee your goals.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_005<tab>The next mark in my rite of passage is a gigantic crocodile of inordinate strength. Nothing short of a massive fish will stand a chance, I'd wager.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_006<tab>Like that one!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_007<tab>The Qor pirarucu! A discernin' eye you've got there, lad.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_008<tab>Those beauties are the svelte swimmers of Urqopacha, packin' ten tonze of fishpower for every onze of flesh.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_009<tab>Pelupelu fishers are known to throw their rods should they hook one─unless they thirst for a swim downstream!

TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_010<tab>I'd offer you that fellow in the tank, but he's the face of Fish Fancies Donuhanu. Of all our offerin's, Qor pirarucu sells surprisin'ly well, likely due to its sheer volume. But <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here will catch you another one─a bigger one!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_011<tab>The fisher who snagged that big boy from Karvarhur the First said it went wild for honeybees. Someone with your arm should have no problems reelin' in a few!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_012<tab>...Probably! You know how to swim, right? Just in case!

TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_020<tab>Haulin' in a fish the size of your own body is a fisher's fantasy, isn't it? <var 09 E948 ((Pack)) ((Pack)) ((And you must do that plenty! Anyway, pack)) ((Pack)) ((Pack)) ((Pack)) ((Pack)) ((Pack)) /var> your bee bag, and go and pull us some Qor pirarucu from around Karvarhur the First.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_025<tab>The face of Fish Fancies Donuhanu... Yes, I'd say the resemblance is uncanny.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_030<tab>Massive and monstrous! Just as good Qor pirarucu ought to be. Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_031<tab>I'm not goin' to ask how you managed to drag this sheer mass of Qor pirarucu all the way back to Tuliyollal. I'm not goin' to ask, but I would love to know.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_040<tab>Now this─this is the sort of Qor pirarucu you need, Pashenine. Smooth, shiny, and enormous!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_041<tab>Are you really plannin' to eat <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> of it?
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_042<tab>Of course. My development demands it.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_100_042<tab>Only by partaking of a fish in its entirety might I come to understand its energies. This applies doubly so for fish of such prodigious body mass.

TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_043<tab>Despite its size, however, I can tell its meat has a mild flavor. A sauce of aromatic herbs should pair well...and I daresay the head will have plenty of fat to lend a savory taste.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_044<tab>You can tell all that with just a look? <whistle> Now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> lovin' thy fish.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_045<tab>But old Donuhanu won't be outdone! I'll learn your recipe and pass it on to everyone who buys a Qor pirarucu!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_DONUHANU_000_046<tab>Just wait till the Pelupelu get a taste of those aromatic herbs, eh? They might start keepin' a firmer grip on their rods!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_047<tab>It is my hope that by creating a delicious dish, I might pay respect to the life of which I partake.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_100_047<tab>Preparing and eating this fish will take some time. If you need me, I shall be in your kitchen, Donuhanu.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_PASHENINE_000_048<tab>And once I have finished...I should be prepared for my rite!

TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Donuhanu is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Fortitudinous Fish Finder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>A new quest continuing the story of Fish Fancies Donuhanu is now available.
TEXT_KINGLA504_04999_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “The Feat of the Brotherhood.”
